rows.label: qst202831_msg0001
rows.name:
After the fight's over
and the world is at peace...

rows.label: qst202831_msg0002
rows.name:
I hope we can all go
rock hunting together.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0003
rows.name:
Maybe we can call the next one
Rexinite?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0004
rows.name: Huh? After me?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0005
rows.name: Not that I mind, but... Why me?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0006
rows.name:
Maybe we can call the next one
Niaprase?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0007
rows.name: You wanna name a rock after me?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0008
rows.name:
I don't think I get the appeal, but...
knock yourself out.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0009
rows.name:
Maybe we can call the next one
MÃ²ragspar?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0010
rows.name: After me?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0011
rows.name: I'm not offended, simply...baffled.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0012
rows.name:
Maybe we can call the next one
Zekerock?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0013
rows.name: You wanna name one after me?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0014
rows.name:
It'd be the most awesome mineral ever!
But, uh...why?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0015
rows.name: It's the same thing as earlier.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0016
rows.name:
I might not remember myself, but
as long as there's a mineral out there
that's named after me...

rows.label: qst202831_msg0017
rows.name: I can live on in everyone's minds...

rows.label: qst202831_msg0018
rows.name:
I just thought I'd like to make sure
your name is remembered too, Rex.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0019
rows.name:
I just thought I'd like to make sure
your name is remembered too, Nia.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0020
rows.name:
I just thought I'd like to make sure
your name is remembered too, Meleph.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0021
rows.name:
I just thought I'd like to make sure
your name is remembered too, Zeke.

rows.label: qst202831_msg0022
rows.name: If I do that, then even if I forget...

rows.label: qst202831_msg0023
rows.name:
the name of the mineral we found
together will live on, right?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0024
rows.name: ...That sounded really soppy, huh?

rows.label: qst202831_msg0025
rows.name: Make sure you keep it a secret, or else!
